title: Elementary Mathematics Foundational Competency Enhancement Course Applying Explicit Systematic Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level arithmetic operations and geometric concepts (1st grade)
context.additional_context: A curriculum for working parents needing mathematics foundational support to assist their children's math learning

learning_goals: Participants can explain three or more instructional strategies for systematically teaching addition and subtraction operations within the number range of 1–20.
Participants can design three-stage learning activities—'counting numbers-recognizing numbers-understanding number relationships'—following explicit instruction methods.
Participants can demonstrate modeling of math concept explanations using visual aids (e.g., base-ten blocks) on online platforms with 80% or higher accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
